verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> what<WH4100> is the vine<WH1612> tree<WH6086> more than any<WH3605> tree,<WH6086> or than a branch<WH2156> which<WH834> is among the trees<WH6086> of the forest?<WH3293>
Shall wood<WH6086> be taken<WH3947> thereof to do<WH6213> any work?<WH4399> or will men take<WH3947> a pin<WH3489> of it to hang<WH8518> any<WH3605> vessel<WH3627> thereon?<WH5921>

Behold,<WH2009> it is cast<WH5414> into the fire<WH784> for fuel;<WH402> the fire<WH784> devours<WH398> both<WH8147> the ends<WH7098> of it, and the middle<WH8432> of it is burned.<WH2787> Is it meet<WH6743> for any work?<WH4399>

Behold,<WH2009> when it was whole,<WH8549> it was meet<WH6213> for no<WH3808> work:<WH4399> how<WH637> much<WH637> <WH3588> less shall it be meet<WH6213> yet for any work,<WH4399> when<WH3588> the fire<WH784> has devoured<WH398> it, and it is burned?<WH2787>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> As the vine<WH1612> tree<WH6086> among the trees<WH6086> of the forest,<WH3293> which<WH834> I have given<WH5414> to the fire<WH784> for fuel,<WH402> so<WH3651> will I give<WH5414> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

And I will set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> against them; they shall go<WH3318> out from one fire,<WH784> and another fire<WH784> shall devour<WH398> them; and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when I set<WH7760> my face<WH6440> against them.
And I will make<WH5414> the land<WH776> desolate,<WH8077> because<WH3282> they have committed<WH4603> a trespass,<WH4604> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
